mapper.select: /* 배송정보번호 조회 */ SELECT di.del_info_no, di.sell_products_no, di.recipient_nm, dl.delivery_addr, dl.delivery_daddr, di.delivery_company, di.billing_number, di.delivery_request, di.delivery_progress, di.register_date, di.depart_date, di.arrive_date from delivery_information di inner join delivery_list dl using(delivery_location_no) where di.del_info_no = #{delInfoNo};

/* 배송정보 조회 검색 */ SELECT di.del_info_no, di.sell_products_no, di.recipient_nm, dl.delivery_addr, dl.delivery_daddr, di.delivery_company, di.billing_number, di.delivery_request, di.delivery_progress, di.register_date, di.depart_date, di.arrive_date from delivery_information di inner join delivery_list dl using(delivery_location_no)
${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%');
